title: Veggie Vietnam Restaurant
description: A vegetarian Vietnamese restaurant serving mostly vegan dishes. Vegans try the soo guy, vegetable fried rice and tofu & vegetables. Has a large menu which includes noodle dishes, soups, different types of rice, variety of vegetables, tofu dishes, many different veggie meats, tempura, spring rolls, curry, desserts and more. Vegans ask if tempura is vegan. Friendly service.
